description: Detects a script interpreter wscript/cscript opening a network connection to a non-local network. Adversaries may use script to download malicious payloads.
name: Script Initiated Connection to Non-Local Network
query: ((winlog.event_data.Initiated:"true" AND process.executable.text:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe)) AND (NOT ((destination.ip:(127.* OR 10.* OR 172.* OR 192.* OR 169.254.* OR 20.*)) OR (destination.ip:(\:\:1* OR 0\:0\:0\:0\:0\:0\:0\:1* OR fe80\:* OR fc* OR fd*)))))
author: frack113
Florian Roth
